name: Penut
body:
### Peanut Markdown Editor
I wrote this because i love markdown, its so simple and easy everyone can learn, share and communication. Markdown is used by github,ghost,trello and many more!
### Features
- Github Flavoured Markdown
- Emoji :D
- [x] -  Checkboxes
- Highlightjs code blocks
- Export to HTML

### More Features Coming
- Settings 0:)
- Markdown color highlighting
- Color Themes/CSS Themes
- Whatever people want.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
